mapper.select: SELECT c.category_id, c.image, c.parent_id, c.top, c.sort_order, cd.name, cd.description, cd.meta_title, cd.meta_description, cd.meta_keyword FROM my_category c LEFT JOIN my_category_description cd ON (c.category_id = cd.category_id) WHERE c.category_id = #{category_id} AND c.status = '1'
SELECT c.category_id, cd.name FROM my_category c LEFT JOIN my_category_description cd ON (c.category_id = cd.category_id) WHERE c.parent_id = #{category_id} AND c.status = '1' ORDER BY c.sort_order

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM my_product_to_category ptc, my_product p, my_product_description pd WHERE ptc.product_id = p.product_id AND p.product_id = pd.product_id AND ptc.category_id = #{category_id} AND p.status = 1

SELECT p.product_id, p.model, p.stock_status_id, p.image, p.price, (SELECT ps.price FROM my_product_special ps WHERE ps.product_id = p.product_id AND ps.customer_group_id IN('0',#{customer_group_id}) AND ((ps.date_start = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_start < NOW()) AND (ps.date_end = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_end > NOW())) ORDER BY ps.priority ASC, ps.price ASC LIMIT 1) AS special, pd.name FROM my_product_to_category ptc, my_product p, my_product_description pd WHERE ptc.product_id = p.product_id AND p.product_id = pd.product_id AND ptc.category_id = #{category_id} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY LCASE(pd.name) ASC
